techmeme.title: Meta adds Stripe CEO Patrick Collison and Dina Powell McCormick, who worked as deputy national security adviser to Trump in his first term, to its board (Sara Fischer/Axios)
Blue Water Autonomy, which says it is building a 100-ton autonomous naval ship, emerges from stealth with a $14M seed from Eclipse VC, Riot, and Impatient (Sean O'Kane/TechCrunch)
Ann Arbor, Michigan-based Optilogic, a supply chain software provider, raised a $40M Series B led by NewRoad Capital and launches a tariff optimization tool (Colin Campbell/Axios)
A group of former OpenAI employees file an amicus brief in support of Elon Musk in his lawsuit opposing OpenAI's for-profit transition (Kyle Wiggers/TechCrunch)
There is increasing uncertainty about China approving Synopsys' $35B Ansys acquisition, amid the escalating tariff fight between the US and China (Bloomberg)
